channel.description: The latest CVEs for Epsiloncool -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-39663|2024-08-02T18:18:46.256Z -- epsiloncool -- wp%20fast%20total%20search
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Epsiloncool WP Fast Total Search allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Fast Total Search: from n/a through 1.68.232.
